This issue is to help plan the [community forums](https://book.the-turing-way.org/community-handbook/community-calls/community-calls-forums/) which are held approximately every other month as part of The Turing Way. 

**This issue is considered done when the pull request updating the notes and a link to the community forum recording is added to the `governance` repository and merged. Please link the PR to this issue.**

# Details
**Date & time:**
**Meeting link:**
**Shared notes link:**
**Presentation slides link:**

# Checklist ✔️

## Preparation - logistics
- [ ] Date and time agreed for Community Forum
- [ ] Chairperson assigned (this should rotate could be a Steering Committee or Maintenance member of the community)
- [ ] Meeting link created (typically Zoom, someone who is attending the meeting needs to be able to host)
- [ ] Technical support assigned (someone who can have host priviledges! ⚠️confirm this through a test run **before the meeting**) 
- [ ] Slide deck created using template in Google drive
- [ ] Create shared notes document using Framapad (link to template)
- [ ] Create sign up form using template in Google drive (https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdxZeib6NTJnWR3Th59hweb4nkNSjfRAd3JfvqdBupSGQ2oQw/viewform?usp=header)
- [ ] Add to Turing Way Google calendar 
- [ ] Send calendar invite to sign ups (check form weekly-ish)

## Preparation - content 
- [ ] Slide deck shared with working groups, delivery groups, and other maintenance members to request content (all working groups and delivery groups should have a slide. People who are acting as Turing Way liaisons should also have the chance to report to the community)
- [ ] Governance/discussion topic for community discussion session agreed with Steering Committee
- [ ] Chair information slide updated 

## Preparation - promotion (ideal by chair, but can ask community management working group to support with social media and newsletters)
- [ ] Shared on Slack
- [ ] Shared on social media
- [ ] Included in newsletters as standard content
- [ ] Reminders 1 week before
- [ ] Reminders on the day or day before - important on Slack ⚠️
- [ ] Add Zoom link to invite day before

## On the day 
- [ ] Open meeting
- [ ] Enable captions
- [ ] Run through CoC, welcome, and notice of recording
- [ ] Hit RECORD ⏺️
- [ ] Chair meeting (see https://book.the-turing-way.org/collaboration/organising-meetings/ for more guidance)
- [ ] Upload slides to Zenodo - submit to The Turing Way community
- [ ] Open PR to close this issue with meeting notes and a link to slides on Zenodo

### Notes on execution
* Not all of this work has to be done by one person - but make sure people know what you are expecting of them!
